languages.text: "Не дерзи! Я убеждал их не складывать головы попусту! У тех зловещих звезд их не могло ждать ничто иное, кроме смерти. А мы прибыли сюда, чтобы служить Всеотцу и отдать кровавый долг! Не гибнуть напрасно! Или ты успел запамятовать это, Пропащий?!"

"Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"
languages.original_text: "Не дерзи! Я убеждал их не складывать головы попусту! У тех зловещих звезд их не могло ждать ничто иное, кроме смерти. А мы прибыли сюда, чтобы служить Всеотцу и отдать кровавый долг! Не гибнуть напрасно! Или ты успел запамятовать это, Пропащий?!"

traits.locale_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “先别急着发火！我警告过他们不要白白送命，因为在那片邪恶的星辰之中，等待他们的只有死亡。我们之所以来这里，是为了侍奉全父，是为了让那些异形血债血偿！不是为了白白送死！莫非你忘了这点吗，迷途之人？”
languages.original_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: “先别急着发火！我警告过他们不要白白送命，因为在那片邪恶的星辰之中，等待他们的只有死亡。我们之所以来这里，是为了侍奉全父，是为了让那些异形血债血偿！不是为了白白送死！莫非你忘了这点吗，迷途之人？”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「怒りを鎮めよ！俺は命を粗末にするなと説得した！あんな邪悪な星々にあるのは死以外の何者でもないとな。俺たちはみな、全知の父にお仕えしてここに来たのだ、この血で報いるために！無意味に死ぬためではない！お前はそれを忘れたのか、エバーロスト？」
languages.original_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: 「怒りを鎮めよ！俺は命を粗末にするなと説得した！あんな邪悪な星々にあるのは死以外の何者でもないとな。俺たちはみな、全知の父にお仕えしてここに来たのだ、この血で報いるために！無意味に死ぬためではない！お前はそれを忘れたのか、エバーロスト？」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «¡Baja esos humos! ¡Yo solo les dije que no desperdiciaran sus vidas! Entre tanta estrella malévola solo les esperaba la muerte. ¡Estamos aquí para servir al Padre de todas las cosas y saldar nuestras deudas de sangre! ¡No para morir en vano! ¿O es que se te ha olvidado, Perdido?».
languages.original_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Baja esos humos! ¡Yo solo les dije que no desperdiciaran sus vidas! Entre tanta estrella malévola solo les esperaba la muerte. ¡Estamos aquí para servir al Padre de todas las cosas y saldar nuestras deudas de sangre! ¡No para morir en vano! ¿O es que se te ha olvidado, Perdido?».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Ravale ta colère ! J'ai essayé de les convaincre de ne pas se sacrifier inutilement ! Rien d'autre que la mort ne pouvait les attendre parmi ces étoiles malveillantes. Nous sommes venus ici pour servir le Père de Tous et honorer notre dette de sang, pas pour mourir en vain ! L'aurais-tu oublié, Égaré ? »
languages.original_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: « Ravale ta colère ! J'ai essayé de les convaincre de ne pas se sacrifier inutilement ! Rien d'autre que la mort ne pouvait les attendre parmi ces étoiles malveillantes. Nous sommes venus ici pour servir le Père de Tous et honorer notre dette de sang, pas pour mourir en vain ! L'aurais-tu oublié, Égaré ? »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Mäßigt Eure Wut! Ich habe sie gedrängt, ihr Leben nicht sinnlos wegzuwerfen! In diesen bösen Sternen erwartet sie nichts als der Tod. Wir alle sind hier, um dem Allvater zu dienen und unsere Blutschuld zu bezahlen! Nicht, um für nichts zu sterben! Oder habt Ihr das vergessen, Siegtnie?"
languages.original_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: "Mäßigt Eure Wut! Ich habe sie gedrängt, ihr Leben nicht sinnlos wegzuwerfen! In diesen bösen Sternen erwartet sie nichts als der Tod. Wir alle sind hier, um dem Allvater zu dienen und unsere Blutschuld zu bezahlen! Nicht, um für nichts zu sterben! Oder habt Ihr das vergessen, Siegtnie?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Sakin ol! Hayatlarını boşu boşuna mahvetmemeleri için yalvardım! O kötücül yıldızların arasında onları ölümden başka bir şey bekliyor olamazdı. Hepimiz buraya Yücebaba'ya hizmet etmek ve kan borcumuzu ödemek için geldik! Hiç uğruna ölmek için gelmedik! Yoksa unuttun mu Hepgaip?"
languages.original_text: "Lower your hackles! I urged them not to throw away their lives in vain! Nothing but death could await them among those malevolent stars. We all came here to serve the Allfather and repay our blood debt! Not to die for naught! Or have you forgotten that, Everlost?"

traits.locale_text: "Sakin ol! Hayatlarını boşu boşuna mahvetmemeleri için yalvardım! O kötücül yıldızların arasında onları ölümden başka bir şey bekliyor olamazdı. Hepimiz buraya Yücebaba'ya hizmet etmek ve kan borcumuzu ödemek için geldik! Hiç uğruna ölmek için değil! Yoksa unuttun mu Hepgaip?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
